Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I don't know what's wrong with me.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I passed my last exam and I even got to eat gigabytes of my favorite meal in the cafeteria. Memory macoroni!

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: So why is my heart racing?
'Cursor-Kun, wake up!'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Something metal slams into my head and I jolt up.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: The object clangs as it hits the floor and I realize it's an oversized bucket.

Name: Snippy
Story: 'Don't you ever pay attention?! Listen when I'm talking, numbnuts!'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: That's right, I remember now...

Name: Snippy
Story: 'Now, as I was saying, this event has been a tradition at MS High for decades, so it's crucial you all participate and find a date.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: It's the pixel dance. I need a date to go? I'll probably just stay home then.

Name: Snippy
Story: 'Or it's an AUTOMATIC FAILURE for the class.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Well, nevermind.

Name: Snippy
Story: 'The dance is tomorrow. So find a date by then or I'll erase you! Class is dismissed!'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: The other students start to disperse and I'm left wondering what I'm going to do..

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Selectora, Lineroni, even ED. Nearly every girl in class has a date already!

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I desperately look around the class to see who's still here. And my eyes meet with possible salvation.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Three girls stand alone in the room.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Bucketina-Chan. She's a bit clumsy and introverted but I'd wager she's as desperate as I am to find a date.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Ares-Sama. She's kind of nuts, constantly telling people she's some sort of overlord with mystical powers. But she's never stricked me as mean, so maybe she'd understand my plight.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: And Bristle-Chan...

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: The most beautiful and popular girl in school. And my old childhood friend. It's been years since we last spoke, and I doubt someone like her hasn't found someone by now. But maybe... Just maybe... She could go with me.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Which one of these ladies should I talk to?
